(Switzerland) | cable chan 2 = Channel 121 | sat radio serv 1 = | sat radio chan 1 = | iptv serv 1 = | iptv chan 1 = | online serv 1 = | online chan 1 = | 3gmobile serv 1 = }} '''Playhouse Disney Channel''' is a children's specialty channel in France. The channel offers various programs for preschoolers and older children from [[Playhouse Disney]] and other sources. The block closed down on May 27, 2011 and was renamed Disney Junior. == Shows that air on Playhouse Disney France == * [[1,2,3 Be Happy]] * [[The adventures of little brown bear]] * [[Jungle Junction]] * [[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]] * [[Handy Manny]] * [[Guess with Jess]] * [[Fireman Sam]] * [[Animal Mechanicals]] * [[The Large Family]] * [[Cajou]] * [[Little Einsteins]] * [[Special Agent Oso]] * [[Ooh, Aah et toi]] * [[Strawberry Shortcake|Charlotte Aux Fraises]] ([[Strawberry Shortcake]]) * [[Bali]] * [[Imagination Movers]] * [[The Magic Roundabout]] - The only Playhouse Disney original series in France * [[Nelly and Cesar]] * [[Thomas & Friends]] * [[Les Voyages de Balthazar]] * [[The Bellflower Bunnies|La Famille Passiflore]] * [[Le Petit Roi Macius]] * [[ChloÃ© magique]] * [[Bear in the big blue house]] * [[Captain Carlos]] * [[Shaun the Sheep]] * [[Charlie and Lola]] * [[LazyTown]] * [[Rolie Polie Olie]] == Former Shows == * [[DrÃ´les de Petites BÃªtes]] * [[Jojo's Circus]] * [[Stanley (2001 TV series)|Stanley]] * [[PB&J Otter]] * [[Higglytown Heroes]] * [[Mousercise]] * [[Bunnytown]] * [[Dim Dam Doom]] * [[101 Dalmatians: The Series]] * [[My Friends Tigger and Pooh]] * [[Bob the Builder]] * [[Ozie Boo!]] * [[Clifford the Big Red Dog]] * [[Clifford's Puppy Days]] * [[Johnny and the Sprites]] * [[Shanna's Show]] * [[SamSam]] == References == [http://www2.disney.fr/DisneyChannel/playhouse/ Official Website] {{Disney Channel}} {{Television in France}} {{France-tv-station-stub}} [[Category:Disney Channel]]
